# .github Directory - Project Management & Automation

This directory contains GitHub-specific configuration files and documentation for managing the Gemini Video project.

> **Note**: Some URLs in this documentation point to the `milosriki/geminivideo` repository. If you fork this repository, update these URLs to point to your fork.

## üìÅ Directory Structure

```
.github/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ ISSUE_TEMPLATE/          # Issue templates for consistent submissions
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ idea.yml            # Template for idea/feature requests
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ config.yml          # Issue template configuration
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ workflows/              # GitHub Actions CI/CD workflows
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ agents/                 # GitHub Copilot agent configurations
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ GITHUB_PROJECTS_INDEX.md    # Central index for all project docs
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ IDEA_WORKFLOW.md            # Visual workflow guide
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ PROJECTS_QUICK_REFERENCE.md # Quick reference card
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ PROJECT_SETUP_EXAMPLE.md    # Detailed setup guide
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ copilot-instructions.md     # GitHub Copilot configuration
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ README.md                   # This file
```

## üéØ Purpose

This directory serves three main purposes:

### 1. Issue Management
Templates and configurations for submitting ideas and issues consistently.

### 2. Project Management
Documentation and guides for using GitHub Projects to track work.

### 3. Automation
GitHub Actions workflows for CI/CD and automated tasks.

## üìö Documentation Files

### GitHub Projects Documentation

Our comprehensive system for managing ideas and features:

| File | Description | Use When |
|------|-------------|----------|
| **[GITHUB_PROJECTS_INDEX.md](GITHUB_PROJECTS_INDEX.md)** | Central hub linking all project docs | Starting point, navigation |
| **[IDEA_WORKFLOW.md](IDEA_WORKFLOW.md)** | Visual guide to idea lifecycle | Understanding the process |
| **[PROJECTS_QUICK_REFERENCE.md](PROJECTS_QUICK_REFERENCE.md)** | Quick lookup for common tasks | Daily reference |
| **[PROJECT_SETUP_EXAMPLE.md](PROJECT_SETUP_EXAMPLE.md)** | Setup guide with configuration examples | Creating new project board |

### Quick Access

**Want to submit an idea?** ‚Üí [Use the Idea Template](https://github.com/milosriki/geminivideo/issues/new?template=idea.yml)

**Want to learn about the process?** ‚Üí Start with [GITHUB_PROJECTS_INDEX.md](GITHUB_PROJECTS_INDEX.md)

**Need a quick answer?** ‚Üí Check [PROJECTS_QUICK_REFERENCE.md](PROJECTS_QUICK_REFERENCE.md)

## üé´ Issue Templates

### Available Templates

1. **Idea / Feature Request** (`idea.yml`)
   - For submitting new ideas and features
   - Includes all necessary fields
   - Auto-labels as `idea` and `needs-review`

### Template Configuration

The `config.yml` file:
- Enables blank issues for flexibility
- Provides helpful links
- Directs users to appropriate resources

## ü§ñ Automation

### GitHub Actions Workflows

Located in `workflows/` directory:
- CI/CD pipelines
- Automated testing
- Deployment workflows
- Code quality checks

See individual workflow files for details.

### GitHub Copilot Agents

Located in `agents/` directory:
- Custom agent configurations
- AI-assisted development tools

## üöÄ Getting Started

### For New Contributors

1. **Read the overview**: [Main README](../README.md)
2. **Learn about projects**: [GITHUB_PROJECTS_INDEX.md](GITHUB_PROJECTS_INDEX.md)
3. **Submit your first idea**: [Create Idea](https://github.com/milosriki/geminivideo/issues/new?template=idea.yml)
4. **Bookmark quick reference**: [PROJECTS_QUICK_REFERENCE.md](PROJECTS_QUICK_REFERENCE.md)

### For Maintainers

1. **Set up project board**: Follow [PROJECT_SETUP_EXAMPLE.md](PROJECT_SETUP_EXAMPLE.md)
2. **Understand workflow**: Review [IDEA_WORKFLOW.md](IDEA_WORKFLOW.md)
3. **Configure automation**: Set up GitHub Actions workflows
4. **Start reviewing**: Check issues with `needs-review` label

## üìã File Purposes

### GITHUB_PROJECTS_INDEX.md
**Purpose**: Central navigation hub  
**Audience**: Everyone  
**Content**: Links to all docs, quick task guide, overview

### IDEA_WORKFLOW.md
**Purpose**: Visualize the idea lifecycle  
**Audience**: Contributors and maintainers  
**Content**: Flowcharts, state transitions, decision criteria, timelines

### PROJECTS_QUICK_REFERENCE.md
**Purpose**: Fast lookup for common tasks  
**Audience**: Daily users  
**Content**: Quick links, shortcuts, common commands, filters

### PROJECT_SETUP_EXAMPLE.md
**Purpose**: Guide for setting up projects  
**Audience**: Maintainers and project leads  
**Content**: Column setup, custom fields, automation rules, views

### ISSUE_TEMPLATE/idea.yml
**Purpose**: Standardize idea submissions  
**Audience**: Contributors  
**Content**: Form fields for submitting ideas

### ISSUE_TEMPLATE/config.yml
**Purpose**: Configure issue templates  
**Audience**: System (GitHub)  
**Content**: Template settings, contact links

## üîÑ Maintenance

### Keeping Documentation Updated

These files should be reviewed and updated:
- **Monthly**: Check for outdated links or processes
- **Quarterly**: Update examples and best practices
- **After major changes**: Update workflows and templates

### Contributing Improvements

Found something to improve?
1. Open an issue with `documentation` label
2. Describe the improvement
3. Submit a PR with changes
